## Project Directors

Kerry Chávez

![](images/image-966861216.png){width="187"}

Kerry Chávez is an instructor in the [Department of Political Science](https://www.depts.ttu.edu/politicalscience/) at [Texas Tech University](https://www.ttu.edu/), where she completed my PhD in the summer of 2022. She is also a [non-resident fellow](https://mwi.usma.edu/research-fellows/kerry-chavez/) with the [Modern War Institute](https://mwi.usma.edu/about-3/) at West Point and a projects director at the [Peace, War, and Social Conflict Lab](https://www.pwscl.com/).

Andrés Gannon

![](images/image-1982633316.png){width="172"}

J Andrés Gannon is a [Stanton Nuclear Security Fellow](https://www.cfr.org/fellowships/stanton-nuclear-security-fellowship) at the [Council on Foreign Relations](https://www.cfr.org/). Starting Fall 2023, he will be an Assistant Professor of [Political Science at Vanderbilt University](https://www.vanderbilt.edu/political-science/) and a Faculty Affiliate at the [Data Science Institute](https://www.vanderbilt.edu/datascience/). He earned his PhD in [[Political Science]{.underline}](http://polisci.ucsd.edu/) from UC San Diego in 2021.
